visible.description: Specifies the visibility of the dialog.

position.description: Specifies the position of the sidebar.

baseZIndex.description: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

dismissable.description: Whether clicking outside closes the panel.

showCloseIcon.description: Whether to display a close icon inside the panel.

closeIcon.description: Icon to display in the sidebar close button.

modal.description: Whether to a modal layer behind the sidebar.

blockScroll.description: Whether background scroll should be blocked when sidebar is visible.

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: show
events.description: Callback to invoke when sidebar gets shown.

events.name: hide
events.description: Callback to invoke when sidebar gets hidden.
